description.value: Whenever another member of the character's squad is killed or otherwise taken out of action, the character can spend a Full Action and Spend a Fate Point to inspire their remaining comrades to vengeance. In doing so the character and all those in Support Range of them return to their starting Cohesion scores.

specialAbilities.name: Vengeance Rally
specialAbilities.description: When a squad member is killed, spend a Full Action and a Fate Point to restore all allies in Support Range to starting Cohesion.
